intro.en: Krabi's cooking classes are centered around Ao Nang and Krabi Town, offering hands-on experiences with Southern Thai cuisine. The area is known for its distinctive flavors, including turmeric-rich curries, fresh seafood dishes, and spicy salads. Many classes include visits to local markets and some even offer scenic locations overlooking the famous limestone karsts.
intro.nl: De kooklessen van Krabi zijn gecentreerd rond Ao Nang en Krabi Town, en bieden hands-on ervaringen met de Zuid-Thaise keuken. Het gebied staat bekend om zijn onderscheidende smaken, waaronder kurkuma-rijke curry's, verse zeevruchtgerechten en pittige salades. Veel lessen omvatten bezoeken aan lokale markten en sommige bieden zelfs schilderachtige locaties met uitzicht op de beroemde kalksteenkarstformaties.

en: Ao Nang has the most cooking class options and is centrally located
Railay Beach has a unique cooking class if you're staying there
Southern Thai cuisine uses more turmeric and coconut than Central Thai food
Morning classes are the most popular — book at least a day in advance
Some classes offer street food cooking which is more affordable and casual
